definition: to lose color/to turn pale/to bleach/to fade
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Benzoyl peroxide can cause fabric to discolour on contact. Use with care.
sentences.chinese: 过氧化苯可能导致织物脱色，请小心使用。

sentences.english: Removes gently with Revlon ColorStay Eye& Lip Makeup Remover .
sentences.chinese: 卸妆时请配合使用露华浓不脱色眼唇部卸妆乳。

sentences.english: Attapulgite clay presented better adsorption capability than bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 凹土的吸附脱色性能优于膨润土。

sentences.english: Because it is a good plating layers of titanium and therefore will never decolorization .
sentences.chinese: 因为是镀了好几层钛银的，因此永远也不会脱色。

sentences.english: The results obtained from the experiments show that the most favorable decoloring agent is powder active carbon.
sentences.chinese: 实验表明，粉状炭作为脱色剂具有更大的优越性。

sentences.english: And the optimum decoloring conditions for P. vulgaris polysaccharide was determined through orthogonal test.
sentences.chinese: 通过正交试验确定了夏枯草多糖脱色的最佳条件。

sentences.english: It is a printing and dyeing mill effluent decolorization for precipitation of a new type of pharmaceutical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 它是一种针对印染厂污水的脱色沉淀治理的新型药剂。

sentences.english: The xylitol fermentation broth was carried out static state discoloring by using activated carbon.
sentences.chinese: 研究用活性碳对木糖醇发酵液的分批脱色。

sentences.english: In this paper , the decolorization and purification technology of tea saponin is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了粗制茶皂素的脱色和纯化工艺。

sentences.english: 2 even after wound healing may be bleaching and so on.
sentences.chinese: 即使伤口愈合后也可能会有脱色等现象。

sentences.english: Anthraquinone dye SN4R can be completely decolorized using crude laccase and mediator.
sentences.chinese: 粗漆酶添加适当浓度的介体物质，可使染料完全脱色。

sentences.english: The sulfate is added again in a decolored filtrate to obtain the cefpirome sulfate.
sentences.chinese: 脱色后的滤液重新加入硫酸成盐得到硫酸头孢匹罗。

sentences.english: Total depigmentation of the nose or inside of the lips.
sentences.chinese: 共计脱色的鼻子或内部的嘴唇。

sentences.english: The decoloration reaction is a zero order.
sentences.chinese: 脱色反应为动力学零级反应。

sentences.english: Participants must put on non-marking sports shoes for competition.
sentences.chinese: 各參赛者必须穿著不脱色胶底运动鞋。

definition: to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]/also pr. [tui4 shai3]
to color (a picture etc)/to dye (fabric etc)/to stain (furniture etc)
